summary: March 26 is the 85th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Kevin Lee Seitzer  is an American former third baseman in Major League Baseball with the Kansas City Royals, Milwaukee Brewers, Oakland Athletics, and Cleveland Indians. He is currently the hitting coach for the Atlanta Braves, having also coached for the Royals, the Arizona Diamondbacks and the Toronto Blue Jays.
title: Kevin Seitzer
